article_title: Another Mayor Makes Allegations Against Gov. Chris Christie's Office
article_text:
The mayor of Hoboken, N.J., has accused the administration of New Jersey Republican Gov. Chris Christie of shortchanging her city of superstorm Sandy funds because she failed to back a real-estate project supported by New Jersey officials.

Mayor Dawn Zimmer said in an interview that she was pushed in May last year to designate a 19-acre parcel in the Hudson River waterfront city as an area in need of development, a status that would...
